snippet: Anish Giri’s performance at the European Individual Chess Championship will knock him out of the top 40, and perhaps even the top 50, in the next rankings.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column notes that Anish Giri’s subpar performance at the European Individual Chess Championship will knock him out of the top 40, and perhaps even the top 50, in the next rankings.
lead_paragraph: Anish Giri’s performance at the European Individual Chess Championship will knock him out of the top 40, and perhaps even the top 50, in the next rankings.

headline.seo: Chess: Anish Giri Has Poor Showing at European Championship
headline.main: In Event Full of Mishaps, No. 4 Seed Does Himself In
headline.print_headline: In Event Full of Mishaps, No. 4 Seed Does Himself In
